content: Yes, oat milk has become more popular in recent years and can typically be found in most grocery stores. It is often sold alongside other dairy-free milk alternatives in the refrigerated section or on the shelf. Some popular brands of oat milk include Oatly, Pacific Foods, and Califia Farms, but there are many others to choose from. If you are having difficulty finding oat milk in your local grocery store, you may want to try health food stores or specialty stores that cater to vegan and dairy-free products.
